basics.name: Daniel Leibold
basics.label: Tech Lead & Product Engineer
basics.summary: I'm an enthusiastic engineer with a strong sense or teamplay. I am a very product focussed developer who priotizes user feedback first and foremost. I'm generally very flexible when investigating new roles.

education.institution: The University of Applied Sciences in Osnabrück

certificates.name: Certified Project Specialist according to IPMA 3.0

publications.name: Testing with VS2012. 'From Dogma to Karma'.
publications.summary: Writing an article about TDD with my former colleague Christoph Molenda.

work.summary: Azure DevOps Automation Engineer in an agile product team (7 people). Cloud-native product development on MS Azure (PaaS) via ARM Templates, PowerShell and C#. Facilitator of agile practices and principles through servant leadership.
work.name: PwC IT Services GmbH
highlights: Role Model for Product Developement (be the first of everything)

work.summary: Developer Evangelist in a cross-functional team (PO, Infrastructure & Security Engineer, Dev, 9 people) that provides platform products as self-services for developers (IDP). “Platform as a Product“-Mindset following Team Topologies. Facilitation of the user experience for the platform services (change of perspective, developer experience (DevEx)). Leading user interviews and gaining insights (qualitative and quantitative).
work.name: PricewaterhouseCoopers GmbH Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft
highlights: Grand total of 3.8mio EUR in 18 month with our services
Used Figma for design and UX work of landing page
Member of Security Triad, Deputy Security Champion
Enable potential 1400 GitLab Ultimate SaaS users to run and operate our services
